name: 4.-node.js-modules
description: - **Definition:** A module is a file containing reusable code that can be imported into other files. - **Modular Programming:**   - Breaking code into small, manageable pieces (modules).   - Each module handles a specific functionality.   - Makes code organized, maintainable, and reusable. - **Example:**   - `hello.js` (main file)   - `maths.js` (contains math functions like add, subtract)
